elements.label: The Minstrel
elements.description: |A young minstrel who likes singing and cats.|

elements.label: The Former Cook
elements.description: |The tavern's former cook. They have put down stews and pots for another cause.|

elements.label: The Soldier
elements.description: |A trained soldier who specializes in lance and halberd.|

elements.label: The Neighboring Lord
elements.description: |A neighboring lord that visits the local monastry.|

elements.label: The Vicar
elements.description: |A vicar who is not so popolar in the parish.|
